title: Katagami Textile Stencil with Vertical Band Design of Stilized Flowers and Horizontal Stripes
dimensions:
paper: H. 25.9 x W. 41.8 cm (10 3/16 x 16 7/16 in.)
pattern unit dimensions: H. 17 x W. 35.7 cm (6 11/16 x 14 1/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Museum Collection
medium: Chûban (medium-sized) minogami (mulberry bark paper) treated with persimmon juice and cut using the "dôgubori" (punch-carving) and "tsukibori" (thrust-carving) techniques
